answers.answer: Hello.Can you mention where the pain starts? Since how long are you having the pain? Your symptoms give an impression of neuropathy. The reasons could be nerve root compression at the spinal level, diabetes, vitamin deficiencies, etc.Have you consulted a neurologist yet?Regards
